item.description:
EVERYONE IS WELCOME TO ATTEND!


_____CARD MEMBER BENEFITS:_____
BRONZE: 10% off food purchases.
SILVER: 15% off food purchases

*FOR THIS EVENT SILVER AND GOLD MEMBERS WILL RECEIVE 15% OFF FOOD PURCHASES*

SUBSCRIBE and $AVE:
Learn more here: www.booze-club.com




Join us at the Golden Temple's E Room where you will experience great company, deliciously healthy Chinese food and let's not forget thirst quenching drinks!! be a part of our first of many events where you can leave your problems behind and unwind for an evening of fun.

The Golden Temple offers an experience instead of just a place to eat, it's all about the mind set of living in the moment and enjoying it to the fullest, who wouldn't be a part of that? right?


How do I get there you ask?
If you are driving stop being lazy and click HERE Parking is off street and there is also a valet for $9.

If you are taking the T it's even easier, just take the Green Line towards Cleveland Circle and get off at Washington Square, the restaurant is about a 40-second walk from there.

If you change your mind about coming last minute or just have questions please don't hesitate to call us, your assistant organizers:

Andrea 786-942-6097
Al 617-407-9659

SUBSCRIBE and $AVE:
Learn more here: www.booze-club.com
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in E room, take a left at the entrance towards the bar....Please remember to maintain your own tab.
item.name: Booze Club Boston's Inaugural Event!!
